name: Birch, Please!
description:
Birch, please! is a holiday decorating game for Google Cardboard. Shoot decorations at the tree and make it your own.

This was the result of having too much time at the family's place over the holidays. Enjoy!

Requires: Android 4.4 KitKat or better.

Made with:

  • FREE Christmas Assets / Low Poly by BRAiNBOX
  • Minimalist Christmas by Broken Ellipse
  • Snowy Low-Poly Trees by False Wisp Studios
  • Audio by Billy Gorilly
